 2008-03532008-02-18,  ,  ,  HERITAGE, 
ActBroadcasting Act
PrecisAppointment of LINDA BLACK, Q.C., of Calgary, Alberta, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Broadcasting Corporation to hold office during good behaviour for a term of four years, in the place of Yasmin Jivraj, effective April 21, 2008.
